roasts.name: Thaddeus Espresso
roasts.tasting_notes: Velvety texture, full bodied, smooth, sweet, mild chocolate, hints of Indonesian earth - or is that my imagination? Lacking the burnt caramel of a darker roasdt that would make it my Favorite Ever, it is nonetheless a great coffee at a wide range of extraction parameters. A great option for when I'm tired of my Favorite Style.

roasts.name: Java Frinsa Collective
roasts.tasting_notes: Solid boomy bass noted Java. Earthy, chocolatey, rasisiny: heavy duty. No-nonsense great coffee. Great for drinking While Doing Something. A+

roasts.name: Zambia Northern Lights
roasts.tasting_notes: Bright but balanced. Not as juice-forward as I was expecting, and that's fine! The juice is in the finish, a pleasant reminder that I just downed a mouthful of full bodied, expertly roasted deliciousness.
